verbs.description: [V: swat] [ARG1: standoff] in athens ends suspect in custody the athens clarke county swat team are in a standoff situation with a man believed to be armed according to the athens clarke county police epifanio rodriguez swat athens clarke county police department the house benjamin b blackburn athens
